description:
<p>We are looking for a committed and caring Practice nurse to join our large Practice team. The vacancy is full time - 38 hrs per week. Ideally the successful candidate will be well woman trained but must be prepared to qualify. For further information or an informal discussion please contact Mrs Jane Thomas, Senior practice nurse on 01656 304204</p>
<p>or  email enquiries.w95041@wales.nhs.uk</p>

hiringOrganization.name: GP Practices - Cwm Taf Morgannwg University Health Board

title: Practice Nurse
